ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Dynamics Explorer 1 Plasma Waves Instrument DC electric field data
ResourceHeader.AlternateName: DE1 PWI DC electric field data
ResourceHeader.Description: Plasma Waves Instrument DC electric field data

InformationURL.Name: NSSDC's Master Catalog on the Plasma Wave Instrument
InformationURL.Description: Introduction to the Plasma Wave Instrument on DE1

AccessURL.Name: Plasma Waves Instrument DC electric field data
AccessURL.Description: This URL contains the DE1 PWI DC electric field Data

NumericalData.ProviderResourceName: Plasma Waves Instrument DC electric field

TimeSpan.Note: Time format in data files is: milliseconds of the day

PhysicalParameter.Name: Universal Time
PhysicalParameter.Description: Universal Time columns from left to right are: yeardoy msec in the format of yyddd msec.

Structure.Description: Universal Time expressed using a 6-column day, month, year, hour, minute, second representation

PhysicalParameter.Name: DE1 Plasma Wave Instrument DC electric field in the perpendicular direction
PhysicalParameter.ParameterKey: PWI DC electric field in the perpendicular direction
PhysicalParameter.Description: PWI DC electric field. The component of the electric field measured in the spin plane that is perpendicular to the projection of the local magnetic field on the spin plane, expressed in volts/meter.

PhysicalParameter.Name: DE1 Plasma Wave Instrument DC electric field in the parallel direction
PhysicalParameter.ParameterKey: PWI DC electric field in the parallel direction
PhysicalParameter.Description: PWI DC electric field. The component of the electric field measured in the spin plane that is parallel to the projection of the local magnetic field on the spin plane, expressed in volts/meter.

PhysicalParameter.Name: DE1 Plasma Wave Instrument DC electric field Quality
PhysicalParameter.Description: PWI DC electric field. An indication of the quality of the data taken with the Ex antenna. A value of -1.0 indicates that the corresponding EPAR and EPER could not be determined.

Measured.Mixed: Quality of electric field flag. No units. Not known if 0 is good and 1 is bad.

PhysicalParameter.Name: DE1 Plasma Wave Instrument DC electric field in the EZ atenna direction
PhysicalParameter.ParameterKey: PWI DC electric field in the EZ atenna direction
PhysicalParameter.Description: PWI DC electric field. The average electric field measured by the Ez antenna, expressed in volts/meter.

PhysicalParameter.Name: DE1 Plasma Wave Instrument DC electric field EZ Quality
PhysicalParameter.ParameterKey: PWI DC electric field EZ Quality
PhysicalParameter.Description: PWI DC electric field. The standard deviation of the electric field measured by the Ez antenna. A value of -1.0 indicates that the corresponding EZAVE could not be determined.

Measured.Mixed: The standard deviation of the electric field measured by the Ez antenna. A value of -1.0 indicates that the corresponding EZAVE could not be determined. Units are not clear. Not known if 0 is good and 1 is bad.

PhysicalParameter.Name: DE1 Plasma Wave Instrument Dummy Value
PhysicalParameter.Description: PWI DC electric field. Dummy Value

Measured.Mixed: Since EZ is mixed in with EX to keep the data arracy flat a dummy value has been put in. The value should always be ZERO.

PhysicalParameter.Name: DE1 Plasma Wave Instrument DC electric field antenna
PhysicalParameter.ParameterKey: PWI DC electric field Antenna used for measurement
PhysicalParameter.Description: PWI DC electric field Antenna used for measurement: EX or EZ or ES or B

Measured.Mixed: Nothing is measured. This is the flag to indicate what type of measurement what used to get the electric field value. This is a flag to indicate the type of measurement made: Ex or Ez.

PhysicalParameter.Name: DE1 spacecraft position vector inerpolated to 1 sec resolution
PhysicalParameter.Description: Location of the spacecraft in magnetic coordinates in units of Re, Re, local time, and latitude
